page.description: Moves the focus down, as if the user pressed the "Down" cursor key.

item.name: Browses (for <OBJECT> use either the <BROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for <OBJECT> use either the <FORM> pointer or the name of the form)

section.description: The <OBJECT>.DOWN() method moves the focus down as if the user had pressed the Down key. Limitations: Desktop applications only.

section.title: Example
section.description: This script moves to the next field on the form:
